messages.title: Only a Labour MP can protect public services from Tory cuts

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Crack down on anti social behaviour, street drinking and minority of parents who let their kids run wild
Including a guaranteed diagnosis within a week if your GP suspects you have cancer
Free personal care for those needing help, protect the elderly and disabled people

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Better Future for Young People
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guaranteed place in education or training for under 18s and a job or training place for all 18-24s

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Halve the Deficit in Four Years
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By promoting economic growth, fairer taxes and cutting the costs of those earning the most

issues.economy: Halve the Deficit in Four Years by promoting economic growth, fairer taxes and cutting the costs of those earning the most
issues.education: A Better Future for Young People guaranteed place in education or training for under 18s and a job or training place for all 18-24s
issues.health: Protect and Improve the NHS including a guaranteed diagnosis within a week if your GP suspects you have cancer

leaflet.personalStatement: I've worked hard for our community for ten years as Southwark's member on the London Assembly. Now I'm asking you for your support to elect me as your MP. I promise to always fight for you and your family and to be accessible and honest in my service of our community.

politicalExperience.role: Southwark's member on the London Assembly

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSEJ-LGLY-LSBC Bermondsey & Old Southwark Labour, London SE1 3SD

endorsements.endorsement: We need a Labour government and Val as our MP to make sure pensioners are looked after properly. You can't trust the Tories!

images.caption: Val Shawcross at St Thomas' Hospital
Val Shawcross with the Labour team in Southwark
